catalog_script_client.name: Display Reference Field From Choice

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_b1434440871a91901acc33f50cbb35f3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Report Inaccurate Values">565fb7bb87c691901acc33f50cbb357b</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:05bf73fb87c691901acc33f50cbb35c0</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Display Reference Field From Choice</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
	   g_form.elements.forEach(function(el) {
		   if(el.type == 'reference') {
			   g_form.setVisible(el.fieldName, false)
			   g_form.setMandatory(el.fieldName, false)
		   }
	   })
   }
	 
	g_form.elements.forEach(function(el) {
		g_form.addInfoMessage(el.reference)
		if(el.type == 'reference' && el.reference == newValue) {
			g_form.setVisible(el.fieldName, true)
			g_form.setMandatory(el.fieldName, true)
		} else if(el.type == 'reference') {
			g_form.setVisible(el.fieldName, false)
			g_form.setMandatory(el.fieldName, false)
		}
	})
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Nicholas.Blanchard</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-27 12:30:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b1434440871a91901acc33f50cbb35f3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Display Reference Field From Choice</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="DOT Employee Directory Manager" source="x_dot_dirmgr">f2ba728813da041032813092e144b01f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DOT Employee Directory Manager">f2ba728813da041032813092e144b01f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b1434440871a91901acc33f50cbb35f3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Nicholas.Blanchard</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-27 13:28:09</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
